name: cartographer
description: Utilities for building and transforming maps using iterables and streams.
author: Mattias Martens <mattiasofmartens@gmail.com>

scripts.test: nyc mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register test/**/*.ts && open coverage/index.html
scripts.compile: rm -rf dist; cd exports; tsc; cd ..
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc dist/exports/* -c .jsdoc.config.json; mv out docs; open docs/index.html
